attributes.action: Children of Great Britain seek BrEUnification
attributes.additional_details: As a 15 year old British citizen I disagree with the choices my elders have made and would like to see the children of Great Britain represented in this debate. #BrEUnification
attributes.background: We the children and future of Great Britain strongly disagree with our elders and seek the reunification of Great Britain with the EU. #BrEUnification

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take to ensure that the voices of children are represented in this debate. If you would like the UK not to leave the EU, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what action you would like to be taken.
